Package aima.core.logic.fol.inference.otter

Interface LightestClauseHeuristic

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultLightestClauseHeuristic
    public interface LightestClauseHeuristic
    Heuristic for selecting lightest clause from SOS. To avoid recalculating the lightest clause on every call, the interface supports defining the initial sos and updates to that set so that it can maintain its own internal data structures to allow for incremental re-calculation of the lightest clause.
    Author:
    Ciaran O'Reilly
